channel.title: Icon Signs Illuminated Mod
channel.description:
Some big stackable icon signs and 3D items for you to place wherever you want in your factory.
There are 90 Stackable Big Icons and 67 3D items to put on belts, containers, machines or wherever you want.
Just a DECORATIVE thing, doesn't change anything in your factory.
To do
* Make it all in one item and make a GUI for change icons * Add Small Icons Signs or make it sizeble * Add some Icons to build on Walls

item.title: Icon Signs Illuminated Mod
item.dc:creator: @Andre_Aquila DellAquila
item.description:
@Andre_Aquila wrote:

Boyshall just released the new version of Icon Signs!!!

ficsit.app

Icon Sign Panel 2.0 - SMR

Add 3 types of Icon sign, pedestal, Stackable, Wallpaper

Still in alpha but it has a lot of new functionalities.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Andre_Aquila DellAquila
item.description:
@Andre_Aquila wrote:

Hey Arunas, This mod is being completely redone, I believe that when ready it will solve these problems.

Read full topic

item.title: Icon Signs Illuminated Mod
item.dc:creator: @Arunas_Buivydas Arunas Buivydas
item.description:
@Arunas_Buivydas wrote:

Nice but, compacted coal and beacon missing. It would be nice if be able to place it on the wall without digging 2m. under. I got too many conveyor belts in one place, without walls I can get just 20-30FPS terrible video quality, but when I make a separate room to every machine got 70-90FPS. but don’t remember who is in the rooms.
https://1drv.ms/u/s!Aj27qWQD2kzuoQmnIASHwEevRbKo?e=uXRcB8
https://1drv.ms/u/s!Aj27qWQD2kzuoQpAlUW5AgBJEh4n?e=h2k6w9

Read full topic

item.title: Icon Signs Illuminated Mod
item.dc:creator: @GmanAtheist_Nell Gman Atheist Nell
item.description:
@GmanAtheist_Nell wrote:

Great idea. Just what is needed to easily see what is what. But. Icons way to big. Obstructs other units. Please make the icons re sizable.

Read full topic

item.title: Icon Signs Illuminated Mod
item.dc:creator: @Andre_Aquila DellAquila
item.description:
@Andre_Aquila wrote:

Thats some awesome ideas! I really like to learn, or pass it for an experienced modder, to create a item with a scroll that you choose what icon you want. That will be perfect.

I will see the flags mod to get an idea, the next step I was thinking about was making each sign personalized with the shape of the item instead squares or circles. But i didnt tested this idea yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Icon Signs Illuminated Mod
item.dc:creator: @ron_won Ron Won
item.description:
@ron_won wrote:

first of all i like this mod a lot, i missed smth like that so much.
i have some suggestions,
is it possible to add other shapes too?
like full squares in different sizes, like half foundation, full foundation, 2/3/5 foundations.
or flat signs, or a circular one like in the “flags”-mod from Illya.
i seen its suggested already, a way to edit the signs with a “E” menu (mb you can talk to Illya for this, (s)he have this in the “flags” mod).
or mb you both can merge your mods that would be awesome

Read full topic

item.title: Icon Signs Illuminated Mod
item.dc:creator: @JamieRCHI Jamie
item.description:
@JamieRCHI wrote:

I like this. Would it be possible, when you get your single sign with GUI thing working, to add the ability to place an external picture on a sign? In the same manner that RCT3 does? I could place some pictures in a specified directory and your GUI would allow me to use my pictures as signs.
Thanks. Great mod.

Read full topic

item.title: Icon Signs Illuminated Mod
item.dc:creator: @nick_lancaster Nick Lancaster
item.description:
@nick_lancaster wrote:

Signs are great! Especially for inventory organization.

Smaller signs would be awesome.

How about, instead of having to have a listing in the build menu for every single item, just a single sign that you configure thru an E menu?

Read full topic

item.title: Icon Signs Illuminated Mod
